function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Potential spread of contagious diseases through manual extraction of tweets","Impact":"Increased risk of exposure and transmission of contagious diseases","Mitigation":"Implement automated data extraction techniques to minimize human contact with potentially contaminated materials","Technologies":"Machine learning algorithms for automated data extraction","People":"Data analysts, researchers, and employees involved in data extraction","Owner":"Data analysis team and IT department"},{"Description":"Risk of misclassification or misinterpretation of noise-related tweets","Impact":"Inaccurate identification of noise complaints and sources, leading to ineffective mitigation strategies","Mitigation":"Implement a comprehensive classification model with human validation to ensure accuracy","Technologies":"Machine learning algorithms, natural language processing (NLP) models","People":"Data analysts, researchers, and noise experts","Owner":"Data analysis team and subject matter experts"},{"Description":"Exposure to potentially harmful content during manual tweet extraction","Impact":"Increased psychological and emotional stress on individuals exposed to negative or distressing tweets","Mitigation":"Provide psychological support and counseling for individuals involved in manual tweet extraction","Technologies":"Employee wellness programs, mental health resources","People":"Employees involved in manual tweet extraction","Owner":"Human resources department and management"}]}
